name: Smith & Squire VR Demo
description:
Smith & Squire is an asymmetric local cooperative virtual reality game where one player creates various weapons in virtual reality while their friend assists them by buying materials and selling the weapons they make on the same PC.

  • Play with your friends - Play together with Smith & Squire! While one player takes on the role of an experienced blacksmith, the other joins as their apprentice. Work towards becoming masters together!
  • Craft with complete freedom - Smith & Squire gives the blacksmith unparalleled crafting choice. Mix and match as you make all kinds of swords, axes and hammers in virtual reality.
  • Learn the ropes - While the blacksmith creates all sorts of awesome weapons, they still need a friend to manage the shop. Help your friend by buying supplies, selling what they make as you slowly learn the trade.
